Renae can introduce you to 2 people at NightHawk Radiology Services
Renae worked at NightHawk Radiology Services
I HIRED a person over 50. Should not be a big deal, but it was. You can't imagine the resistance I had to overcome.
" He will never work hard enough", "he will not fit into our culture", "he will be taking a lot of sick days", "he is overqualified" etc
Nobody said he was too old. They were all "politically correct".
Even now, many years later, I am still upset about those remarks.
I had to put my foot down to get him hired.
Long story short, he was one of the best hires I ever made. We all learned from him. He made a huge difference for the company.
We should STOP calling people over 50 as "overqualified" and "over the hill".
Instead let's consider using these: veteran, very experienced, "someone I can learn from", someone who can make a huge difference because of their experience.
"The world is changed by your example, not by your opinion." - Paulo Coelho

Used social media, employee referrals and recruiters as part of the recruiting strategy.•	Developed a new benefits program for the company. Reported trends and turnover rates to executive management.  •	Benchmarked salaries for SheKnows positions.•	Worked with managers on creating position descriptions.•	Created and rolled out a benefit survey and Employee Engagement survey.•	Managed the Payroll Manager/Benefits Administrator and Office Administrator.

John Wolff
IT Practice Lead at VincentBenjamin
August 27, 2015, Renae was a client of John’s

I have known John for 3 years.  We met while I was in a job search.  Once I landed, I contacted John to help with several IT positions my company had open.  He and his team were very successful.  They filled at least 20 positions.  John took the time to get to know the culture of the company, the hiring manager and the IT team.  If there ever was a problem with a candidate, John handled it and did the right thing.  There are numerous search firms and account managers in Phoenix.  I believe John is one of the best.

I had the pleasure of working with LaMont for 1 ½ years while at NightHawk.  He was hired as the IT Manager for the new Phoenix location.   Being in HR, I worked with LaMont on staffing his department and on employee relations issues.  I found him to be professional and responsive while working with his staff and all levels of the organization.   He did a great job training his staff in order to meet the needs of the business and came up with innovative ideas to make IT support run more smoothly.
